    Creates storage on given path with chosen configuration of storage Configuration of storage represents size, forbidden extensions and number of files/directories in storage

    boolean

    Uploads file from user directory on system

    • listFilesFromDirectory

      List<FileWrapper> listFilesFromDirectory​(String... extensions) throws DirEmptyException
      Returns list (of names) of files and directories saved on current path. If extension exists, then method returns files with wanted extension.
      Parameters:
      extensions -
      Returns:
      List that contains names of files in chosen directory
      Throws:
      DirEmptyException
